name: CyPolice MechAgent - Miyu Mk. II
text:
2 Cyberse Monsters, including a "CyPolice Agent - Miyu"
When this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "CyPolice" Monster from your GY to your hand. During the Main Phase: You can Tribute 1 "CyPolice" Monster from your hand or field and, if you do, Special Summon a Link-1 "CyPolice" Monster from your Extra Deck to a zone this card points to. If this Link Summoned card is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect, you can Special Summon "CyPolice Agent - Miyu" from your GY. You can only use each effect of "CyPolice MechAgent - Miyu Mk. II" once per turn.
